Confirmation: Confirm.
Give names to the dots and list the properties described.

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx, tol=0.1)
        check_xy_different_size_shade = different_size([x,y], ctx) and different_color([x,y], ctx)
        check_xz_different_size_shade = different_size([x,z], ctx) and different_color([x,z], ctx)
        check_yz_different_size_shade = different_size([y,z], ctx) and different_color([y,z], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_xy_different_size_shade
            and check_xz_different_size_shade
            and check_yz_different_size_shade
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_different = x != y
        check_x_smallest_black = is_small(x, ctx) and is_black(x, ctx)
        check_y_largest_dark_grey = is_large(y, ctx) and is_dark_grey(y, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_different
            and check_x_smallest_black

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_different = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_smallest_black = is_small(x, ctx) and is_black(x, ctx)
        check_y_largest_darker_gray_z = is_large(y, ctx) and is_darker(y, z, ctx)
        check_z_medium_light_gray = is_medium_size(z, ctx) and is_light_gray(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_different
            and check_x_smallest_black
            and check_y_largest_darker_gray_z
            and check_z_medium_light_gray
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
